name: Wall Walkers 2
description:
Cover art made with StableDiffusion (promt: red knife stuck in soil)

Sequel to Wall Walkers! Now featuring more features such as settings, levels, up to 4 players, and soon more!

Game refers to TIC-80 buttons when it does, not to your gamepad or keyboard keys. Default bindings are arrow keys and (TIC-80 key=keyboard key): A=Z, B=X, X=A, Y=S. Only first "gamepad" has mapped buttons, if you want to play with other players you have to set keys for respective "gamepads". Not mentitioned in-game controls are ability (hold A(Z) to convert your score into spare time) and pause (press B(X) on any "gamepad" of alive player to set game to pause). You can change controls by pressing ESC during gameplay and choosing Options, then Setup gamepad.

More updates will be made later
